title: Breitling Bentley Flying B Chronograph Watch
description: Breitling Bentley Flying B stainless steel automatic mens watch. Pink chronograph dial, date, case diameter: 58.2mm x 38.5mm, wrist size: 21cm, Swiss made. Ref# A44365. With Breitling stainless steel bracelet and clasp. With Certificate of Authenticity, Breitling International Warranty Booklet dated 28/10/2007 and Breitling box. 3 month FSA warranty. Weight: 234.2g (Pre-owned)
